ygData.subject: Re: Hunting wisps
ygData.msgSnippet: If you can make it... Visit Kerra Isle, you can find by taking the boat between Qeynos and Eurdin.  Its loaded with wisp and its just a small island.  You can
ygData.messageBody:
If you can make it... Visit Kerra Isle, you can find by taking the boat
between Qeynos and Eurdin. Its loaded with wisp and its just a small
island. You can get stones through-out the day. But they are easier to see
at night because the ones that carry stones light up the ground around them.

Lance

-----Original Message-----
From: thormael@... [mailto:thormael@...]
Sent: Tuesday, April 27, 1999 8:33 PM
To: EverQuest@onelist.com
Subject: [EverQuest] Hunting wisps


From: thormael@...

Hi,

Where should I hunt wisps for greater lighstones? It seems I'm only able to
get one lighstone per night, at most, in greater faydark. Are there zones
with more wisps? Are there zones where wisps hold more greater lightstones?
Or are the greater lighstones very rare, even on wisps, or was I just way
unlucky?

Thormael
